sentence.Network_en: The right to elect chieftains and to depose them.
sentence.Network_cn: 选举和撤换酋长的权利.

sentence.Network_en: The witness is going to depose.
The emperor attempted to depose the Pope.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词怎么记啊_爱问知识人 ... expose“ 暴露” depose“ 罢免” ①compose“ 作曲，作图，写作，合成”.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... composure n 镇静，沉着 depose v 免职；沉淀 discompose v 使不安.
deport 放逐,驱逐出境depose 废除deprecate 反对,不赞成,鄙视
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... juxtapose 并排，并置 depose 免职，废黜 repose 躺着休息，安睡.

list.abs: in its filing against the Wongs , the SEC said it would seek to " depose witnesses , subpoena bank and brokerage records and take other discovery expedited basis " .在对王氏夫妇的诉讼文件中，美国证交会表示，将寻求“证人证词、索取银行和券商纪录……并快速完成其它取证”。
depose beer yeast becomes material , distilling , the liquid take out of Yeast cell , apping to soy sauce .以废啤酒酵母为原料，通过酶解提取细胞内含物制得酵母抽提液、灭酶，应用于酱油工艺进行发酵试验。
The witness deposed that she had seen the accused on the day of the murder ., 证人宣誓证明在谋杀案发生当天她看见过被告.
they deposed , exterminated and deprived him of communion .他们罢免、消除和褫夺他的教派。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French deposer, from Latin deponere (see deponent), but influenced by Latin depositus and Old French poser 'to place'

entry.tran: 罢免，废黜(统治者或政治领导人)
entry.def: If a ruler or political leader is deposed, they are forced to give up their position.

example.ex: Mr Ben Bella was deposed in a coup in 1965...
example.tran: 本·贝拉先生在1965年的一次政变中被推翻。

example.ex: Ferdinand Marcos fled to Hawaii in 1986 after being deposed as president of the Philippines.
example.tran: 1986年，菲律宾总统费迪南德·马科斯被赶下台后逃往了夏威夷。

means.word_mean: 2. make a deposition; declare under oath

auth_sentence.content: Failed attempt to depose king and establish republic.

auth_sentence.content: Ugandan troops help depose Mobutu Sese Seko of Zaire, who is replaced by Laurent Kabila.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dispose安排+ed……的→任安排的→心甘情愿的
in不+disposed[adj.愿意的,想干的]→adj.不愿意的,身体不适的

pose放→n.姿势,姿态 v.造成,提出,摆姿势,佯装
propose[v.计划, 建议, 向……提议, 求[婚] v.打算, 求婚]+al表名词→n.提议,建议;求婚

sentences.en: The head of state was deposed by the army.
sentences.cn: 国家元首被军队罢免了。
